quote: Martha thanks Sylvia, gesturing with the book. ""Just remember not to try to hard with understanding it, "" Sylvia says. ""Like people, they're best not to be too thoroughly understood.
quote_letters: MARTHA THANKS SYLVIA GESTURING WITH THE BOOK JUST REMEMBER NOT TO TRY TO HARD WITH UNDERSTANDING IT  SYLVIA SAYS LIKE PEOPLE THEYRE BEST NOT TO BE TOO THOROUGHLY UNDERSTOOD
